name: Hibernate
description:
On a certain island called Canor, there was a mysterious phenomenon. One day, people started falling asleep and not waking up, just like mammals hibernating during Winter. Forte was one of them. He found himself in a strange place full of snow and learned that his physical body was actually have been sleeping for days.

What was happening? 

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Art, Story, Scripting, Text Box GUI by Altila
